content:
```
EXISTING STRUCTURES
None

ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place a entity to a tile before attempting placing. Check for existing entities before attempting to place a new entity. The error message provides the location of the conflicting entity.
- When placing an entity next to another, ensure there is enough space and no conflicting entities in the target location. The error message provides the location of the conflicting entity and suggests alternative directions or spacing.

NAMESPACE
None
```
